titleStmt.title: A Christian turn'd Turke: or, The tragicall liues and deaths of the two famous pyrates, Ward and Dansiker As it hath beene publickly acted. VVritten by Robert Daborn, Gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Daborne, Robert, d. 1628.
Barker, Andrew, fl. 1609. True and certaine report of the beginning, proceedings, overthrowes, and now present estate of Captaine Ward and Danseker, the two late famous pirates.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Nicholas Okes] by for [sic] William Barrenger, and are to be sold at the great north-doore of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Based on: Barker, Andrew. A true and certaine report of the beginning, proceedings, overthrowes, and now present estate of Captaine Ward and Danseker, the two late famous pirates.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
